attributes.action: Give the right to refuse to pay tax when relevant government targets are not met each fiscal year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a target driven society where promises of reform and change are backed by unrealistic figures in order to win votes, the voter; ie the public should be given the option to refuse paying tax. Thereby targets and promises would need to be realistic, and the public would no longer be lied to.
